mapper.select: select cs.*,ec.class_name from class_scoreboard cs LEFT JOIN edu_grade_class ec on cs.class_id = ec.id where cs.school_id = #{schoolId} order by score

SELECT es.school_name name,p.score from edu_school es LEFT JOIN ( select sc.school_id,sc.score from score_record_school as sc where not exists( select 1 from score_record_school where school_id = sc.school_id and sc.id < id and sc.bureau_id = #{bureauId} ) ) p on es.id = p.school_id ORDER BY p.score
